page.title: 08Village Events
page.content: A yearly event is the Halvegate village fete which takes place in the summer on the playing field. This was bought with money raised by local people and the fete which provides the income to maintain the field, involves many people providing games, competitions, and raffles, the selling of cakes, some second hand articles and a variety of stalls and refreshments. Being part of a rural are another of Halvergate's attractions is the yearly show in the village hall, a competitive event which everyone can take part in it concentrates on fruit, vegetables, flowers, cakes, jams, pickles and handicraft.
